title: Dolphy
summary: Rodolfo Vera Quizon Sr.[1] GCGH (Tagalog pronunciation: [ˈkizon]; July 25, 1928 – July 10, 2012), better known by his stage names Dolphy, Pidol, and Golay (1944), was a Filipino comedian and actor. He is widely regarded as the country's "King of Comedy" for his comedic talent embodied by his long roster of works on stage, radio, television and movies.[2][3]
